Hong Kong legislature passes third reading of national security billHong Kong lawmakers on Tuesday passed a third reading of a new national security bill which edged a step closer to being fully passed. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 10:53:16 GMT TMNM6MVGLBLJTDD42HEUUQYPZI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/hong-kong-legislature-passes-third-reading-national-security-bill-2024-03-19/Reuters世界中国
Russian Defence Ministry says its forces have captured the village of Orlivka from UkraineThe Russian Defence Ministry said on Tuesday its forces had captured the village of Orlivka in Ukraine's eastern Donetsk region, 9.5 kilometres (5.9 miles) from the Russian-controlled town of Avdiivka. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 10:52:06 GMT YGRM7DNXEBMPJBQ5GHKSFLKYTU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-defence-ministry-says-its-forces-have-captured-village-orlivka-ukraine-2024-03-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Germany to order new JASSM-ER cruise missiles from US, says BildThe German government has started the ordering process for JASSM-ER cruise missiles from the United States in a package that could have a total price of more than 8 billion euros ($8.67 billion), German daily Bild reported on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 10:49:49 GMT H2Y3FJA2TFN5DK3D5VAGBQHDRY https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/germany-order-new-jassm-er-cruise-missiles-us-says-bild-2024-03-19/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
EU's Borrell wants to use 90% of frozen Russian assets revenues to buy arms for UkraineEuropean Union foreign policy chief Josep Borrell said on Tuesday he will propose that the EU uses 90 percent of the revenues from Russian assets frozen in Europe to buy arms for Ukraine via the European Peace Facility fund. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 10:48:52 GMT BFJL4J3HPJJBRGC42PA3J7CI2Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eus-borrell-wants-use-90-frozen- Russian-assets-revenues-buy-arms-ukraine-2024-03-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Israel's restrictions to Gaza aid may amount to war crime, says UN rights officeThe United Nations human rights office said on Tuesday that Israel's restrictions on the entry of humanitarian aid into Gaza could amount to a war crime. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 10:32:06 GMT U4FGYLTW4JMV5N6SRW7A3N7H7I https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israels-restrictions-gaza-aid-may-amount-war-crime-says-un-rights-office-2024-03-19/Reuters世界中东
Hungary's sovereignty law threatens free debate, says rights watchdogHungary's new sovereignty law could have "a chilling effect" on free and democratic debate in the country, a panel of constitutional law experts from the Council of Europe, a human rights watchdog, said on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 10:27:33 GMT I3KA2FSXB5OY7JNLPFK3IY3GBU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/hungarys-sovereignty-law-threatens-free-debate-says-rights-watchdog-2024-03-19/Anita Komuves世界欧洲
Six former Mississippi police officers to be sentenced in federal assault caseSix former law enforcement officers who prosecutors say called themselves the "Goon Squad" are expected to be sentenced this week after they pled guilty last year to U.S. civil rights charges for brutally assaulting two Black men, including shooting one in the mouth. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 10:03:32 GMT WGIRZ6TQSVKUTATBMTSGJUX2NM https://www.reuters.com/world/us/six-former-mississippi-police-officers-be-sentenced-federal-assault-case-2024-03-19/Brendan O'Brien世界美国
In test of Trump's clout, Ohio Republicans pick US Senate challengerDonald Trump's sway over Ohio Republicans will be tested in the state's U.S. Senate primary on Tuesday, when they decide whether to nominate a political newcomer backed by the former president to challenge Democratic U.S. Senator Sherrod Brown in November. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 10:02:07 GMT ZTCPHGQMBZOODMZFNMRBILZD3M https://www.reuters.com/world/us/test-trumps-clout-ohio-republicans-pick-us-senate-challenger-2024-03-19/Reuters世界美国
Tunisia-Libya border crossing closed due to clashesTunisia and Libya have closed a major border crossing at Ras Jdir due to armed clashes, Tunisian state TV and Libyan authorities said. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 09:52:59 GMT PZGCZTYJLFLODJATIYD2CO57CY https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/tunisia-libya-border-crossing-close-due-clashes-2024-03-19/Reuters世界非洲
Around 9,000 children to be evacuated from Russia's Belgorod due to Ukrainian shelling - governorAround 9,000 children will be evacuated from the Russian city of Belgorod and from several districts in the wider region of the same name due to Ukrainian shelling, Vyacheslav Gladkov, the regional governor, said on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 09:25:22 GMT 2SXNRLCTLRPITFVC4UU6KFWUTQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/around-9000-children-be-evacuated-Russias-belgorod-due-ukrainian-shelling-2024-03-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Exclusive: Putin to visit China in MayRussian President Vladimir Putin will travel to China in May for talks with Xi Jinping, in what could be the Kremlin chief's first overseas trip of his new presidential term, according to five sources familiar with the matter. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 08:45:33 GMT IOVATI4BY5LPJBASAQSGDLUZOA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russias-putin-visit-china-may-sources-2024-03-19/Laurie Chen, Yew Lun Tian, Guy Faulconbridge世界欧洲
